languages.text: "Ты в порядке, старик? С кем это ты сейчас говорил?.. Эй, почему отводишь взгляд!"
"Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"
languages.original_text: "Ты в порядке, старик? С кем это ты сейчас говорил?.. Эй, почему отводишь взгляд!"

traits.locale_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

languages.text: “你还好吗，老家伙？你刚才在和谁说话…？嘿，你在看什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: “你还好吗，老家伙？你刚才在和谁说话…？嘿，你在看什么呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tout va bien, vieillard ? À qui vous parliez, là, à l'instant... ? Et qu'est-ce que vous regardez exactement ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout va bien, vieillard ? À qui vous parliez, là, à l'instant... ? Et qu'est-ce que vous regardez exactement ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Está bien, anciano? ¿Con quién hablaba...? ¿Qué está mirando?».
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Está bien, anciano? ¿Con quién hablaba...? ¿Qué está mirando?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「大丈夫、おじいちゃん？今の話し相手は…？ねえ、何を見てるんだい？」
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: 「大丈夫、おじいちゃん？今の話し相手は…？ねえ、何を見てるんだい？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Geht es Euch gut, alter Mann? Mit wem habt Ihr gerade gesprochen ...? Hey, was guckt Ihr so?"
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

traits.locale_text: "Geht es Euch gut, alter Mann? Mit wem habt Ihr gerade gesprochen ...? Hey, was guckt Ihr so?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Are you all right, old man? Who were you talking to just now...? Hey, what are you looking at?"

languages.text: "İyi misin ihtiyar? Az önce kiminle konuşuyordun? Neye bakıyorsun?"
